short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make and receive calls using your 2talk numbers, and click to dial phone numbers from any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing 2talk Keypad, an extension designed for 2talk users to elevate their communication experience directly within their browser. This powerful tool is your new go-to for making and receiving phone calls effortlessly without ever leaving your browser.

Click to Dial
2talk Keypad enables you to dial any phone number you come across on a webpage with just a simple click. Save time and enhance your productivityâ€”no more copying and pasting!

Advanced Call Features
Whether you need to transfer calls to a colleague, merge calls for a quick discussion, or set up a conference with multiple participants, 2talk Keypad has you covered. You can also place calls on hold and manage multiple calls simultaneously, and check if the call's being currently recorded for future reference.

To get started with 2talk Keypad, all you need is a 2talk account with an active plan. Once you're logged in, your numbers will all be there, ready to unlock a world of seamless calling capabilities directly from your browser. Not a user yet? Join the 2talk community today and experience the future of communication!
